name: Don’t Drop
description:
Whoever said you wouldn’t use school physics in real life?! We’ve got the proof right here! And it’s time to test your physics skills and find out if you can put them into action with Don’t Drop!

Using just wire and nails, pull the strings so that you can balance the objects. Looks so simple, but it’s oh-so-challenging. Can you arrange the rope and balance the object? Give it a go in Don’t Drop to find out!
